nodes.description: Eva和Ernest Weiss在二战期间待在集中营。
nodes.support_text: Eva and Ernest Weiss were in concentration camps in World War II, and married in 1946 in Romania.

nodes.description: Eva和Ernest Weiss于1946年在罗马尼亚结婚。
nodes.support_text: Eva and Ernest Weiss were in concentration camps in World War II, and married in 1946 in Romania.

nodes.description: 这对夫妇于1964年来到以色列，并定居在佩塔提克瓦。
nodes.support_text: In 1964 the couple came to Israel and settled in Petah Tikva.

nodes.description: 在过去的三年里，他们选择了帕克酒店来庆祝逾越节家宴。
nodes.support_text: and in the last three years chose the Park Hotel.

nodes.description: 恐怖分子引爆了爆炸装置，当场造成22人死亡，140人受伤。
nodes.support_text: He detonated an explosive device, killing 22 immediately and injuring 140, seven of whom died later.

nodes.description: Eva和Ernest Weiss与他们的朋友George Yakobovitz一同在爆炸中丧生。
nodes.support_text: Both were killed together with their good friend George Yakobovitz, who was at the same table.

nodes.description: 袭击者被确认为来自图勒凯尔姆的哈马斯伊宰·丁·卡桑旅成员。
nodes.support_text: The bomber was identified as a member of the Hamas Iz a Din al-Kassam Brigades, from the West Bank city of Tulkarem, which is just 10 kilometers (six miles) east of Netanya.

nodes.description: Eva Weiss被安葬在佩塔提克瓦，与她丈夫Ernest的墓地在一起。
nodes.support_text: Eva Weiss was laid to rest in Petah Tikva alongside her husband Ernest.

nodes.description: 250位客人刚刚坐下准备开始逾越节家宴。
nodes.support_text: 250 guests had just sat down to begin the seder

nodes.description: 客人们开始逾越节家宴。
nodes.support_text: 250 guests had just sat down to begin the seder

nodes.description: 恐怖分子走进了酒店的餐厅。
nodes.support_text: On the eve of Passover, the terrorist walked into the dining room of the hotel
injuring 140, seven of whom died later

nodes.description: 以色列曾请求逮捕这些恐怖分子。
nodes.support_text: 以色列曾请求逮捕这些恐怖分子。

nodes.description: （未明确）执法机构将（被请求）逮捕这些恐怖分子。
nodes.support_text: （未明确）执法机构将（被请求）逮捕这些恐怖分子。
